mirador-viewer.title: The Digitised Hershcel Matierals from Trinity College, Cambridge
mirador-viewer.content:
All of the existing material related the the Herschel family that has currently been digitised by Trinity Colle, Cambridge, is available via the viewer below. As these IIIF manifests have been created on an ad-hoc basis over the last few years, variations in form and content are to be expected. Over the coming months, we seek to standardise these records as well as begin to digitise the remaining material held in the college's collections

[##]

About the Hershcel Material.title: About The Herschel Material
About the Hershcel Material.content: The materials related to the Herschel family at Trinity College are found within our modern manuscripts collection, and are available via the [AtoM catalogue|https://archives.trin.cam.ac.uk/index.php/informationobject/browse?topLod=0&sort=relevance&query=Herschel]. INSERT DIANA'S TEXT HERE.

Acknowledgements.title: Acknowledgements
Acknowledgements.content:
Simple Site Collaborations

The Simple Site project has developed out of work from a number of different projects, all of which involved some aspect of developing project websites, or documented methods of disseminating formatted data. This work will continue across the listed projects but further collaborations are anticipated.

Acknowledgement

This project has been directly supported by the following projects:

The SSHOC Project

The ARTICT Project

The IIIF - TANC Project

The HeritagePIDs Project
